title: Couscous and Chickpea Salad
ingredients: ['125ml creamy salad dressing', '4 tablespoons natural yoghurt', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt and pepper to taste', '15g butter', '85g couscous', '250ml water', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '20g chopped parsley', '50g raisins', '45g flaked almonds, toasted', '120g tinned chickpeas, drained']
